C

com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.spring - package com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.spring
 
Cql - Annotation Type in com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.spring
@Cql is used to annotate a test method to configure CQL Cql.scripts() and Cql.statements() to be executed against a given cluster during integration tests.
Cql.ExecutionPhase - Enum in com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.spring
Enumeration of phases that dictate when CQL scripts are executed.
CqlScripts - Annotation Type in com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.spring
Container annotation that aggregates several Cql annotations.

E

EmbeddedCassandra - Annotation Type in com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.spring
Annotation that can be applied to a test class to configure an Embedded Cassandra Cluster to use instead of any application defined Cluster.

V

valueOf(String) - Static method in enum com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.spring.Cql.ExecutionPhase
Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
values() - Static method in enum com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.spring.Cql.ExecutionPhase
Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
